meanings.definition: Distributing leaflets or flyers to promote a cause or event.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys leafleting for animal shelters on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The volunteers will be leafleting at the park tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: After leafleting for the charity, she accidentally dropped a leaflet on her own head.
meanings.sent4: The idea of leafleting the neighborhood with invitations spread quickly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of leafleting echoed through the empty streets.

meanings.definition: The act of handing out printed materials to passersby.
meanings.sent1: Leafleting can help raise awareness about local events.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of activists engaging in leafleting outside the mall.
meanings.sent3: The leafleting at the fair made the pigeons very excited.
meanings.sent4: Her bag was heavy with the leafleting she had to distribute.
meanings.sent5: The colorful leafleting caught the attention of many pedestrians.

meanings.definition: The practice of spreading information through the distribution of leaflets.
meanings.sent1: Leafleting is a common method used during election campaigns.
meanings.sent2: The success of the event was partly due to effective leafleting.
meanings.sent3: The leafleting competition at the office was fierce but friendly.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, leafleting remains a powerful communication tool.
meanings.sent5: The art of leafleting requires creativity and strategy.
